title: Can listening to times tables while I sleep help me subconsciously learn them? - Quora

response.answer_text: There have been numerous studies done regarding “sleep studying” and the most current are easy to google. One enduring theory that is simple to test for yourself is this: what you focus on just as you drift off to sleep remains well-embedded in long term memory. Set a reminder on your pillow and ponder those difficult digits as you drift off and see for yourself how you retain that data.
